knimeNode.name: Google Cloud Storage Connection (Labs)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides a file system connection to Google Cloud Storage.

fullDescription.intro: This node configures the connection information that will be used to connect to Google Cloud Storage. Using this connection the other KNIME remote file handling nodes such as Excel Reader and Excel Writer can download and upload files from and to Google Cloud Storage.
fullDescription.option: Google Cloud project identifier. See Google Cloud Documentation for more informations.
Determines if the path normalization should be applied (i.e. eliminating redundant elements of the path like "." or ".." and a preceding name).
Timeout in seconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.
Timeout in seconds to read data from an established connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.

ports.inPort: The Google API connection that will be used.
ports.outPort: Google Cloud Storage File System Connection
